verses.plain: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.

tokens.t: I love the
, because he hath heard my voice
my supplications.

verses.plain: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

tokens.t: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon
as long as I live.

verses.plain: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

tokens.t: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

verses.plain: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.

tokens.t: Then called I upon the name of the
; O
, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.

verses.plain: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.

tokens.t: Gracious
the
, and righteous; yea, our God
merciful.

verses.plain: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.

tokens.t: The
preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.

verses.plain: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.

tokens.t: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the
hath dealt bountifully with thee.

verses.plain: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.

tokens.t: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears,
my feet from falling.

verses.plain: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.

tokens.t: I will walk before the
in the land of the living.

verses.plain: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

tokens.t: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

verses.plain: I said in my haste, All men are liars.

tokens.t: I said in my haste, All men
liars.

verses.plain: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?

tokens.t: What shall I render unto the
all his benefits toward me?

verses.plain: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.

tokens.t: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the

verses.plain: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.

tokens.t: I will pay my vows unto the
now in the presence of all his people.

verses.plain: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.

tokens.t: Precious in the sight of the
the death of his saints.

verses.plain: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.

verses.plain: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.

verses.plain: In the courts of the LORD’s house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
